alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 9:35PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pickens and southern Lamar Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 934 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bigbee Valley, or near Pickensville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gordo, Reform, Carrollton, Pickensville, Ethelsville, Garden, Bevill Lock And Dam, Ashcraft Corner, Dillburg, North Pickens Airport, McShan, Shaw, Owens, Kirk, Lubbub, Forest and Macedonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Alabama.
